scripts.build: node -r esm build.js && npm run copy
scripts.copy: cpy src/aes/aes.asm.d.ts dist_es5/aes && cpy src/aes/aes.asm.d.ts dist_es8/aes && cpy src/bignum/bigint.asm.d.ts dist_es5/bignum && cpy src/bignum/bigint.asm.d.ts dist_es8/bignum && cpy src/hash/sha1/sha1.asm.d.ts dist_es5/hash/sha1 && cpy src/hash/sha1/sha1.asm.d.ts dist_es8/hash/sha1 && cpy src/hash/sha256/sha256.asm.d.ts dist_es5/hash/sha256 && cpy src/hash/sha256/sha256.asm.d.ts dist_es8/hash/sha256 && cpy src/hash/sha512/sha512.asm.d.ts dist_es5/hash/sha512 && cpy src/hash/sha512/sha512.asm.d.ts dist_es8/hash/sha512
scripts.test: npm run build && mocha -r esm test/*.js
